snippet.title: The Grave Digger Trailer and Free Demo
snippet.description:
Try the demo here: 229.19mb 
http://www.indiedb.com/downloads/the-grave-digger-demo

❤ Subscribe for new games updates! http://bit.ly/Sub2Alromani

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Tweet2Alromani

The demo will offer you 4 playable levels that will take 10-15 min to finish 

This game is made by 2 persons Thomas Innes and Joseph Salter

Developer website:
http://homegroangames.co.uk

A preview of our debut game "The Grave Digger". Take control of shovel-master Fagus in this third person action-adventure following the exploits of a grave robber extraordinaire with an unfortunate tendency to cross paths with deadly ghosts AND WORSE!

I'm afraid of badgers 

You can make a difference. Support Oxfam
http://bit.ly/Donate2Oxfam
